Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Zenit Hotel Salento in Lecce, you'll be connected to the airport and convenient to Chiesa dei Santi Nicolo e Cataldo and Holy Cross Cathedral. This hotel is within close proximity of University of Lecce and Lecce Obelisk.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 34 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Lecce? This hotel has facilities measuring 323 square feet (30 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
